data.text: Mangan bɔɲɛn luxi nɛn
Muxuna kirane birin tinxin a yɛtɛ yɛɛ ra yi,
Tinxinyaan nun kiti kɛndɛn saan nafan Alatala ma
Yɛɛ rawason nun yɛtɛ yiteen nan findixi
Tunnafan muxuna miriyane findima munanfanna nan na,
Nafunla naxanye sɔtɔxi wuleni
Muxu ɲaxine gbalone e ralɔma ayi nɛn,
Yulubitɔne biraxi kira yifuxin nan fɔxɔ ra,
A fisa i lu banxin fari ma dogodogoni,
Muxu ɲaxin kunfaxi fe ɲaxin nan xɔn,
Xa magele tiin saran a fe ɲaxin na,
Tinxinna Kanna muxu ɲaxina denbayaan nakɔrɔsima nɛn,
Naxan na a tunla dutun
Finmaseen na so muxun yii wundoni
Sɛwan na a ra tinxin muxun xa,
Naxan na keli xaxilimayaan kiraan xɔn,
Mananmanantɔɔn setareyaan kolonma nɛn.
Muxu ɲaxin nun yanfantenna gbalon nan sɔtɔma,
A fisa i dɔxɔ tonbonni,
Nafulu kɛndɛn nun ture faɲin namaraxi fekolonne konne yi,
Naxan na bira tinxinyaan nun hinanna fɔxɔ ra,
Fekolonne nɔɛ kurugbane taan tongɛ nɛn,
Naxan na a dɛɛn nun a falan suxu,
Feene birin magele wasode yɛtɛ yigboon yii.
Muxu narixine waxɔn feene nan e faxama,
E kunfaxi e waxɔn seene xɔn waxatin birin,
Se haramuxin nan muxu ɲaxine saraxane ra.
Wule seren halagima nɛn,
Muxu ɲaxina a wɛkilɛn yitama a yɛtagin nan ma,
Fe kolonya mi na, xaxilimaya mi na,
Yɛngɛ so soone yitɔnma nɛn
